text:
*Update:* We've released a new version of the HubSpot CLI (version `7.0.2`) that should resolve the local dev issue posted right above this message :point_up:

If you experience any issues getting live reloading to work during your local development sessions, let us know here!

Here's the <https://github.com/HubSpot/HubSpot-cli/releases/tag/v7.0.2|new release details>, and you'd install it as usual via:
 `npm i -g @HubSpot/cli@7.0.2`
